A4.text: Constantine died soon after at a suburban villa called Achyron, on the last day of the fiftyâ€‘day festival of Pentecost directly following Pascha (or Easter), on 22 May 337.

A5.text: Following his death, his body was transferred to Constantinople and buried in the Church of the Holy Apostles.
